[[Image:Dallas Cowboys helmet rightface.png|thumb||180px|right|The Dallas Cowboys selected the first players in franchise history.]]
 
The '''1960 NFL Expansion Draft''' was a National Football League (NFL) draft in which a new [[expansion team]], named the [[Dallas Cowboys]]<ref>Initially the team was called the [[Dallas Cowboys#History|Dallas Rangers]].</ref>, selected its first players. The NFL awarded [[Dallas, Texas]] its first NFL franchise to compete for revenue with [[Lamar Hunt|Lamar Hunt's]] [[Kansas City Chiefs|Dallas Texans]] of the upstart [[American Football League]].<ref name=FWST>{{cite news|title=From meager beginnings to Americaâs Team|date=2008-02-15|last=Buck|first=Ray|work=Fort Worth Star-Telegram}}</ref> The Dallas expansion franchise was approved too late for it to participate in the [[1960 NFL Draft]].<ref name=FWST/> The Cowboys are the only NFL expansion team to not have had the benefit of a college draft in its first year.<ref name=FWST/>
The '''1960 NFL Expansion Draft''' was a National Football League (NFL) draft in which a new [[expansion team]], named the [[Dallas Cowboys]]<ref>Initially the team was called the [[Dallas Cowboys#History|Dallas Rangers]].</ref>, selected its first players. The NFL awarded [[Dallas, Texas]] its first NFL franchise to compete for revenue with [[Lamar Hunt|Lamar Hunt's]] [[Kansas City Chiefs|Dallas Texans]] of the upstart [[American Football League]].<ref name=FWST>{{cite news|title=From meager beginnings to Americaâs Team|date=2008-02-15|last=Buck|first=Ray|work=Fort Worth Star-Telegram}}</ref> The Dallas expansion franchise was approved too late for it to participate in the [[1960 NFL Draft]].<ref name=FWST/> The Cowboys are the only NFL expansion team to not have had the benefit of a college draft in its first year.<ref name=FWST/>
